title: Christmas Skin Idea
body:
I wish I had the effort to draw right now, but one I don't have a tablet and two I am poor.

Anyways, with the release of Kayn. I will be very dissapointed if he doesn't get a Christmas Skin this year.... It's so obvious and too stupid not to do.

We need Candy Kayn, we really do.

replies.body: Candy Kayn... this is a genius idea! His weapon could be a candy cane... :0
